code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{fetchProducts,createProduct,updateProduct,deleteProduct}from'./api';import ProductList from'./components/ProductList';import ProductForm from'./components/ProductForm';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[editingProduct,setEditingProduct]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{loadProducts();},[]);async function loadProducts(){const data=await fetchProducts();setProducts(data.products||[]);}async function handleAddOrUpdate(productData){if(editingProduct){await updateProduct(editingProduct._id,productData);setEditingProduct(null);}else{await createProduct(productData);}loadProducts();}async function handleDelete(id){await deleteProduct(id);loadProducts();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Product Catalog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductForm,{onSubmit:handleAddOrUpdate,product:editingProduct}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductList,{products:products,onEdit:setEditingProduct,onDelete:handleDelete})]});}export default App;
